metadata.dc:description: As a result of finding some ectopic adrenal debris in the spermatic cord, the present report studies the embryogenesis and clinical implications that can derive from the existence of the referred adrenal debris. The relevant literature is reviewed and six new cases contributed, one of them bilateral.
metadata.dc:title: Ectopia adrenal en cord칩n esperm치tico.
[Adrenal ectopia in the spermatic cord].
